review: This movie gives us an inspirational message to help 3 people and ask them to help 3 other people for making a difference in the entire world. Salman  khan did a good role in this film. This movie may remake but not fake because it has upgraded the spirit of patriotism.so, I liked the movie so much Jai ho!

May be it gives inspirational message but adding vulgar content in movie to excite youth is nonsense and some lines could embarrass you if you watch infront of family.
Like one dialogue where daisy shah in film is wearing pink panty is getting point of joke really making it worst scene which make anyone feel embarrassed if they are with family.

This movie is exact copy of South indian movie stalin, which was original movie released on 20th September 2006. And Jai ho is the movie released on 24th Jan 2014. I don't know till when bollywood keeps on copying movies from hollywood and south Indian movies. Worst, thing of copying. waste.

It was a very bad remake of Stalin. Poor acting as Salman ever do he acted last time in Tere Naam not a single movie with acting after that. Don't waste your time to watch this try some old one like 'Do Beegha Zameen', Aanand etc.
